Name: Koo & Yuu
About the game: Koo & Yuu is a minimalist puzzle game where you control two players: Koo, big and slow and Yuu, small and fast. Take them to the teleportation platforms to complete the level. Features 80+ Levels created by hand. 15+ Different color styles for your view. Exclusive soundtrack. Simple and beautiful minimalist aesthetic game. No time limit, score or distraction.
